3. Transformative Self-Recontextualization (開權顯實 kaiquanxianshi)

This strange “neither-same-nor-different” structure of the
Three Truths is to be understood in accordance with another key
Tiantai concept, “opening the provisional to reveal the
real” (開權顯實 kaiquan
xianshi). This is a way of further specifying the relation
between local coherence and global incoherence, which are not only
synonymous, but also irrevocably opposed, and indeed identical only by
means of their opposition and mutual exclusivity. Provisional truth is
the antecedent, the premise, and indeed in a distinctive sense the
cause of ultimate truth, but only because it is the strict
exclusion of ultimate truth.
